DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the COVID-19 vaccine administered dose number.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent or treat coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Concepts.definition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released. 04/08/2021 KMM. Updated conceptual domain. 05/05/2021 KMM

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction.: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.: An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.: A suffix denoting the second person having the same complete name (first, middle, and family names).: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A suffix denoting the second person having the same complete name (first, middle, and family names).
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A second or later vaccine dose, separated from the first by time, to increase, extend, or maintain the immune response of the previous vaccination.

Concepts.definition: A second or later vaccine dose, separated from the first by time, to increase, extend, or maintain the immune response of the previous vaccination.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time. :Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
